com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.commands.factories

Class MainCommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.commands.factories.MainCommandFactory

  • public class MainCommandFactory
extends Object
    A factory for creating commands for the main menu and toolbar used by MainCommandListBuilder.
